snippet: With receivers Roddy White, Julio Jones and tight end Tony Gonzalez at the disposal of quarterback Matt Ryan, Atlanta has a knack for coming up with big passing plays.
abstract: Atlanta Falcons, who are preparing to face San Fransisco 49ers in NFC title game, have one of the most explosive offenses in NFL; quarterback Matt Ryan's completion rate on passes of more than 20 yards is tops among remaining playoff quarterbacks.
lead_paragraph: With receivers Roddy White, Julio Jones and tight end Tony Gonzalez at the disposal of quarterback Matt Ryan, Atlanta has a knack for coming up with big passing plays.

headline.seo: N.F.C. — Falcons’ Offense Relies on Long Ball
headline.main: Falcons’ Offense Makes a Habit of Going for the Long Ball
headline.print_headline: Falcons’ Offense Makes a Habit of the Long Ball
